name: Android-style tabs (FX 56-)
description: Applies some Material Design to the tabs by making them transparent and adding a white underline to the active tab.

user.name: tulirebane
user.about: I no longer update my UI styles in this site, please check out my GitLab repo for the newest stuff!

additional_info:
If the tabs look off with a line height other than 3px, please edit the paddings in the code manually. The paddings vary theme by theme, they are not exactly proportional to line height. Goes well with:
  • style 114113
  • style 140689
  • style 140646
  • style 125431
  • style 103772
  • style 97369
  • style 138014
  • style 138011
